level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 8(h) of the Recreation Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-20, February 28, 1995, 42 DCR 1175).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-198
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-198, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-306.
